document_data.caption: A map showing Murlpar Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Murlpar Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Murlpar Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Murlpar Street was located in the northwestern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on [[Aureenar Street]] where it branched south through a neighborhood to eventually end on the [[Ghostwalk (Waterdeep)|Ghostwalk]].
